ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the INTERNATIONAL LETTER-POST ITEMS REGULATIONS which will increase by 23.1% postage for letters, cards and postcards destined to the United States and by 12% postage for foreign destination, effective January 12, 2004.
